title: Organizing and Teaching Science
description: Techniques, aims and objectives in the teaching of physical and life sciences at the secondary level. Selection and organization of teaching material, including strategies for English language learners (ELL) and special needs students. Evaluation of results. 3 lectures, 1 activity. Crosslisted as BIO/PSCÂ 424.
prerequisites: Admission to the Single Subject Credential Program or consent of instructor
